reviews.review_msg: great teacher,very helpful, nice and kind, and what can i say, a great teacher. Better than C.A. I would recommend anyone to take her class. Class discussion and maybe easy marker. TAKE HER!!! TRUST ME lol.
Hannah...a great prof.She knows her stuff and made it a fun and interesting class. She wants all her students to do well and is always willing to help as long as you put int the effort.

Hannah was extremely open to suggestions from the class about how it should be run, friendly and approachable, and gave completion marks without even reading your work, which made for an easy A. At times it seemeed like there was way too much class participation and not enough structure, but overall a good teacher.
